introduction.title: Our Culinary Experience
introduction.content: Welcome to our culinary journey where tradition meets innovation. Each dish is crafted with care using locally-sourced ingredients and time-honored techniques. Our seasonal menu celebrates the richness of Mediterranean flavors with a contemporary twist. Bon appetit!

dishes.name: Bruschetta
dishes.description: Grilled sourdough bread topped with fresh tomatoes, basil, garlic, and extra virgin olive oil.

dishes.name: Arancini
dishes.description: Sicilian rice balls stuffed with mozzarella, peas, and a touch of saffron, lightly fried to perfection.

dishes.name: Beef Carpaccio
dishes.description: Thinly sliced raw beef with arugula, shaved parmesan, capers, and truffle oil.

dishes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
dishes.description: Classic Roman dish with pancetta, egg, pecorino cheese, and black pepper.

dishes.name: Penne all'Arrabbiata
dishes.description: Penne pasta with spicy tomato sauce, garlic, and parsley.

dishes.name: Risotto ai Funghi
dishes.description: Creamy Arborio rice with wild mushrooms, white wine, and parmesan.

dishes.name: Osso Buco
dishes.description: Slow-braised veal shanks in white wine and vegetables, served with saffron risotto.

dishes.name: Bistecca alla Fiorentina
dishes.description: T-bone steak grilled to perfection with rosemary and garlic, served with roasted potatoes.

dishes.name: Eggplant Parmigiana
dishes.description: Layers of eggplant, tomato sauce, mozzarella, and parmesan cheese baked to perfection.

dishes.name: Tiramisu
dishes.description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream.

dishes.name: Vanilla Panna Cotta
dishes.description: Silky vanilla custard with seasonal berry coulis and fresh mint.

dishes.name: Sicilian Cannoli
dishes.description: Crispy pastry tubes filled with sweet ricotta cream, pistachios, and chocolate chips.
